short_description_localized.en: You’ll have 200 square feet and city views from one of our higher floors in this room with one queen bed.
short_description_localized.es: You’ll have 200 square feet and city views from one of our higher floors in this room with one queen bed.

description_localized.en: We are just two blocks from the Empire State Building, so staying up on one of our higher floors seems appropriate. A queen bed, 200 square feet of space, and daily continental breakfast ensure you will have all you need for a comfortable, affordable stay in the heart of Midtown Manhattan. Max. 2 guests.
